item.title: AFSB Dehradun - Day 1
item.author: Author
item.description: Day - 1. Read my preparation and my experience in 1-AFSB Dehradun. I was screened-in but unfortunately not-recommended. Read what mistakes I did so that you won’t.

item.title: AFSB Dehradun - Day 2
item.author: Author
item.description: Day - 2. Read how I fared on my second day where all the psychological tests were done. And yeah I had almost got myself expelled too and got an asterisk.

item.title: The Kargil War 1999
item.author: Author
item.description: Pakistani “soldiers” intruded inside India and captured numerous strategically important hills and mountain tops. India deployed their forces to evict them and after a 75 days brutal, bloody, and inspiring war, on 26th July 1999 (Vijay Diwas), India recaptured all its territory.

item.title: A small thing nobody taught you in Python
item.author: Author
item.description:
Have you ever noticed that some stuffs like lower(), upper(), sort() etc. are called like this variable.lower() or variable.sort(). But most of the other function are called like this len(variable), str(variable).
What’s the difference?

item.title: What the heck is defer?
item.author: Author
item.description:

item.description: A GUI based Python connectivity project on Hospital Management. The front-end is made using Tkinter and the back-end is managed by MySQL.
